title: One bedroom apartment is waiting
posting_body: ['Newly listed and freshly painted 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Ocean Hill, Brooklyn.', 'Centrally located.', 'Library on the corner.', 'J train 2 blocks away.', 'A large living room leads to a fully equipped kitchen with wooden cabinets that still look brand new.', ' There is a brushed steel refrigerator and matching range.', 'A good size bedroom has a smaller bathroom where everything works.', 'There is a closet with a sliding door where you can store most if not all of your clothes.', 'Quiet 3 family building with working families, looking for a mature, secure individual or retired person who can appreciate the value being offered.', 'While utilities are included; it comes with a caveat of normal electrical use.', 'If you see yourself as part of the revitalization that is sweeping the area; this unit may be your answer.', 'Real Estate and Brokers; are not welcomed or encouraged to respond.', 'Principals only; no third parties, please.', 'ERH Inc. 718-857-8188']
